# Karnataka State Film Award for Best Children Film__disambig_1

| former name =

Karnataka State Film Award for Best Children Film is a state film award of the Indian state of Karnataka  given during the annual Karnataka State Film Awards. The award honors the Kannada cinema.
Award winners
The following is a list of award winners and the name of the films for which they won.
